```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r data_packages}

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

wildfire_damages <- read_csv("fire17_1_1979-2017_damage_TableToExcel.csv")

```

Descriptive statistics

```{r sum_by_year}

annual_damages <- wildfire_damages %>% 
  group_by(YEAR_) %>% 
  summarise(Structures = sum(Total_dama))

annual_acres_survey <- wildfire_damages %>% 
  group_by(YEAR_) %>% 
  summarise(Acres = sum(Total_acre))

annual_acres_shape <- wildfire_damages %>% 
  group_by(YEAR_) %>% 
  summarise(Acres = round(sum(GIS_ACRES), digits = 0))

```
